mapper.select: select e.emp_id as emp_id, e.emp_nm as emp_nm, e.dept_id as dept_id, d.dept_nm as dept_nm, p.pos_nm as pos_nm from emp e inner join dept d on e.dept_id = d.dept_id inner join pos p on e.pos_id = p.pos_id and e.emp_id = #{emp_id}
select e.emp_id, e.emp_nm, d.dept_nm , p.pos_nm from emp e,dept d,pos p where e.pos_id = p.pos_id and e.dept_id = d.dept_id

select e.emp_id as emp_id , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , d.dept_nm as dept_nm , p.pos_nm as pos_nm , a.att_time as att_time , a.lea_time as lea_time from emp e left outer join ATTENDANCE a on a.emp_id = e.emp_id and att_dt = #{att_dd} inner join dept d on e.dept_id = d.dept_id inner join pos p on e.pos_id = p.pos_id where e.emp_id not in ('master') order by d.dept_sort, e.pos_id, e.emp_id
select DISTINCT substr(att_dt,1,6) as att_mm from attendance order by att_mm desc

select e.emp_id as emp_id , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , d.dept_nm as dept_nm , p.pos_nm as pos_nm , (select DISTINCT count(emp_id) from ATTENDANCE where substr(att_dt,1,6) =#{att_mm} and att_dt <= sysdate group by emp_id) as all_work_day , (select count(att_dt) from ATTENDANCE where EMP_ID = e.emp_id and substr(att_dt,1,6) =#{att_mm} and att_dt <= sysdate and att_time is not null and lea_time is not null) as att_day , (select count(att_dt) from ATTENDANCE where EMP_ID = e.emp_id and substr(att_dt,1,6) =#{att_mm} and att_dt <= sysdate and att_time is null and lea_time is null) - (select count(vat_dt) from ATT_VAT_DAY where emp_id = e.emp_id and substr(vat_dt,1,6) =#{att_mm} and vat_dt <= sysdate ) as abs_day , (select count(vat_dt) from ATT_VAT_DAY where emp_id = e.emp_id and substr(vat_dt,1,6) =#{att_mm} and vat_dt <= sysdate ) as vat_day from emp e left outer join ATTENDANCE a on a.emp_id = e.emp_id and substr(att_dt,1,6) = #{att_mm} and att_dt <= sysdate inner join dept d on e.dept_id = d.dept_id inner join pos p on e.pos_id = p.pos_id where e.emp_id not in ('master') group by e.emp_id, e.emp_nm, d.dept_nm, p.pos_nm, d.DEPT_SORT, e.pos_id order by d.dept_sort, e.pos_id, e.emp_id
